column2: caption = "Mean (sd) 10-fold cross validation results for Riemannian PLS on the ABIDE dataset for the first ten latent variables extracted.  The full model metrics are the multivariate $R^2$ and RMSE on recovering age, subject group, sex, and eye status.  The group classification metrics look at the classifcation accuracy of the Riemannian PLS model for subject group only.  All metrics are optimised at $K = 3$ (blue).",
